title: Ethereum Inflation? ETH Supply Has Grown by $47 Million in 30 Days
description: The growth has largely been driven by a corresponding lack of transaction activity on the blockchain network.

title: NeuralBox iPhone App AI-Powered to Give Photographic Memory Companion
description: For those drowning in a sea of digital clutter, NeuralBox, a groundbreaking iPhone camera app, has emerged as a lifeline, offering the promise of AI-powered photographic memory. title: Avalanche Price Prediction 2023-2032: Time to Buy AVAX?
description: Avalanche Price Prediction 2023-2032 A quadrant chart by TrueUp (a tech recruitment firm) collated data from the job review platform Glassdoor — mapped out how crypto firms stack up regarding growth vs employee happiness. title: AI-Generated Art Wins Inaugural Prompted Peculiar International AI Prize
description: In a groundbreaking moment for the world of art, the inaugural Prompted Peculiar International AI Prize was awarded to a captivating black-and-white image titled “Twin Sisters in Love.” The photograph, featuring two women embracing an octopus, was created with the assistance of an artificial intelligence tool, marking a significant milestone in the fusion of technology ... title: Ripple CTO urges AMM integration into XRP Ledger
description: Automated market makers (AMMs) are a fascinating aspect of decentralized finance, David Schwartz says. Integration hinges on the consensus of the XRPL community, he added.

title: Avalanche (AVAX)-Based Social Finance Platform Suffers $2,900,000 Exploit: Peckshield
description:
A social finance (SocialFi) platform built on Avalanche (AVAX) has suffered losses after bad actors targeted a smart contract vulnerability.  Stars Arena allows content creators to monetize their expertise by selling tickets or shares to their followers using AVAX tokens to facilitate the sale.  In a post on social media platform X, cybersecurity firm Peckshield […]

The post Avalanche (AVAX)-Based Social Finance Platform Suffers $2,900,000 Exploit: Peckshield appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
